species.name: nidoran-m
descriptions: It constantly moves its large ears in many directions in order to detect danger right away.
It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.
It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. It will strike first if it senses any danger.
It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
